mapper.select: select * from st.approval_type
select * from st.approval_sign_type
mapper.insert: insert into st.approval values(st.app_seq.nextval, #{app_type_code}, #{app_id}, #{app_archive}, #{app_title}, 'temp', (select current_date from dual),#{app_docs_num},1)
mapper.select: select max(app_seq) from st.approval where app_id=#{id} order by app_seq desc
select * from st.approval where app_id = #{value}
select * from st.approval where app_seq = #{value}
select * from st.approval_sign where app_sign_id = #{value} and app_sign_type_code != 1 and app_sign_date is null order by app_seq desc
select * from st.approval_sign where app_sign_id = #{value} and app_sign_type_code != 1 and app_sign_date is not null order by app_seq desc
select count(*) from st.approval_sign where app_sign_id = #{value} and app_sign_type_code != 1 and app_sign_date is null
select count(*) from st.approval_sign where app_sign_id = #{value} and app_sign_type_code != 1 and app_sign_date is not null
select count(*) from st.approval_sign where app_sign_order = #{order} and app_seq = #{app_seq} and app_sign_accept = 'Y'
select count(*) from st.approval_sign where app_seq = #{app_seq} and app_sign_order = #{order}
select count(*) from st.approval_sign where app_seq = #{app_seq} and app_sign_accept = 'Y'
select app_seq from st.approval_sign where app_sign_id = #{id} and app_sign_type_code = 1
select count(*) from st.approval_sign where app_sign_id = #{id} and app_sign_type_code = 1
select * from st.approval join st.approval_type using (app_type_code) join st.approval_status using (app_status_code) where app_seq=#{app_seq}
select * from st.approval_sign join st.member on (id=app_sign_id) join st.approval_sign_type using (app_sign_type_code) where app_seq=#{app_seq} order by app_sign_order
select * from st.approval_attached_files where app_seq=#{app_seq}
mapper.update: update st.approval set app_contents = #{fileName} where app_seq=#{app_seq}
update st.approval_sign set app_sign_accept=#{app_sign_accept}, app_sign_date=(SELECT CURRENT_DATE FROM DUAL) where app_seq=#{app_seq} and app_sign_id=#{app_sign_id}
mapper.insert: insert into st.approval_comments values(st.app_cmt_seq.nextval, #{app_seq},#{app_cmt_writer},#{app_cmt_contents},(SELECT CURRENT_DATE FROM DUAL),null)
mapper.select: select * from st.approval_comments where app_seq=#{app_seq} and app_cmt_del is null order by app_cmt_seq
mapper.update: update st.approval_comments set app_cmt_del=(SELECT CURRENT_DATE FROM DUAL) where app_cmt_seq=#{app_cmt_seq}
update st.approval set app_status_code = #{app_status_code} where app_seq = #{app_seq}
mapper.select: select count(*) from st.approval_sign where app_seq = #{app_seq} and app_sign_type_code != 1

select app.app_seq,app_docs_num,app_title,name,app_reg_date,app_status_name,app_type_name from st.approval app join st.approval_type using(app_type_code) join st.approval_status using(app_status_code) join st.member on id=app_id, (select app_seq from (select app_seq, row_number() over(order by app_seq desc)rn from st.approval_sign where app_sign_id = #{id}) where rn between 1 and 5) seq where app.app_seq=seq.app_seq
